### cleanup() {#a3419f1e4b5a20b3ec28ae5f1f3c6f32b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void cleanup (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp; BFI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Clear all memory not needed downstream.

Releases all memory not used downstream. In particular, saves Freqs.

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Dithering mass distributer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class splits up a single mass into portions by weight, dithering to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// spread out error.  No mass is lost.  The dithering precision depends on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// precision of the product of \\a BlockMass and \\a BranchProbability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The distribution algorithm follows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  1 Initialize by saving the sum of the weights in \\a RemWeight and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     mass to distribute in \\a RemMass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  2 For each portion:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      1 Construct a branch probability, P, as the portion&#39;s weight divided</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         by the current value of \\a RemWeight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      2 Calculate the portion&#39;s mass as \\a RemMass times P.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      3 Update \\a RemWeight and \\a RemMass at each portion by subtracting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         the current portion&#39;s weight and mass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72">DitheringDistributer</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#ae6c0133daebcc1cc43d268690dd76ebd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#ae6c0133daebcc1cc43d268690dd76ebd">RemWeight</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a515a4de69fa4a07d16c0692e3cef1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a515a4de69fa4a07d16c0692e3cef1207">RemMass</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72">DitheringDistributer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a03c5183992b1c37a3db46deb244a3b72">Distribution</a> &amp;Dist, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> &amp;Mass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#abf138cba5a790381de6f4356e4f4386e">takeMass</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/ditheringdistributer/#a09b288abbf093b5ee513ce99b8921c72">DitheringDistributer::DitheringDistributer</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#a03c5183992b1c37a3db46deb244a3b72">Distribution</a> &amp;Dist,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ac24f62f9ac4bff8273ed15798ea650e8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ac24f62f9ac4bff8273ed15798ea650e8">Distribution::normalize</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early exit for termination nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only bother if there are multiple successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.size() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a6750f9ed35f65ba11b4c3c00d9d4fb4d">combineWeights</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early exit when combined into a single successor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.size() == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.front().Amount = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine how much to shift right so that the total fits into 32-bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we shift at all, shift by 1 extra.  Otherwise, the lower limit of 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for each weight can cause a 32-bit overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#ad9359948311bce04a3628b0db4376b77">DidOverflow</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Shift = 33;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> &gt; UINT32&#95;MAX)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Shift = 33 - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early exit if nothing needs to be scaled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Shift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we didn&#39;t overflow then combineWeights() shouldn&#39;t have changed the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sum of the weights, but let&#39;s double-check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> == std::accumulate(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>.end(), UINT64&#95;C(0),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    &#91;&#93;(uint64&#95;t Sum, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight">Weight</a> &amp;W) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sum + W.Amount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &#125;) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected total to be correct&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recompute the total through accumulation (rather than shifting it) so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s accurate after shifting and any changes combineWeights() made above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sum the weights to each node and shift right if necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight">Weight</a> &amp;W : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#a5e4eb3a7c89dcc532ee7aee4e2029674">Weights</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale down below UINT32&#95;MAX.  Since Shift is larger than necessary, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can round here without concern about overflow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(W.TargetNode.isValid());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    W.Amount = std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="#af7b0ebc6a85830e67121d86801e54d8f">shiftRightAndRound</a>(W.Amount, Shift));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(W.Amount &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the total.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> += W.Amount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution/#aaf226952008495c98bd9d9652b25cfd8">Total</a> &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!OuterLoop || !OuterLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/loopdata/#a8884f4ab1dd22269ce25837403cbb726">isIrreducible</a>()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &quot;Pred&quot; is a loop header, then this isn&#39;t really a backedge; rather,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OuterLoop must be irreducible.  These false backedges can come only from</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute the loop scale for a loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6aca67ed248d1eb55621f38869372c65"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6aca67ed248d1eb55621f38869372c65">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase::computeLoopScale</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/loopdata">LoopData</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute loop scale.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;compute-loop-scale: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a58791fa7d9b74c05628abed162ce2725">getLoopName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Infinite loops need special handling. If we give the back edge an infinite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mass, they may saturate all the other scales in the function down to 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// making all the other region temperatures look exactly the same. Choose an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arbitrary scale to avoid these issues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: An alternate way would be to select a symbolic scale which is later</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// replaced to be the maximum of all computed scales plus 1 This would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriately describe the loop as having a large scale, without skewing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the final frequency computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a5514a17c0ec3ccae841930a4f8f74f99">Scaled64</a> InfiniteLoopScale(1, 12);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopScale == 1 / ExitMass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExitMass == HeadMass - BackedgeMass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6e6da6d64b5e1623157336544dd0e7a2">BlockMass</a> TotalBackedgeMass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Mass : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.BackedgeMass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalBackedgeMass += Mass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a6e6da6d64b5e1623157336544dd0e7a2">BlockMass</a> ExitMass = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#ac0e3f20571279f8b3896a687101d7151">BlockMass::getFull</a>() - TotalBackedgeMass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Block scale stores the inverse of the scale. If this is an infinite loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its exit mass will be zero. In this case, use an arbitrary scale for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop scale.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExitMass.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#a3874be041c63e0b867d82331409a0de2">isEmpty</a>() ? InfiniteLoopScale : ExitMass.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#af48ed4af672b3ec628c6c79ac0746312">toScaled</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a49501fa3f3636bfe66d89739e5f43685">inverse</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - exit-mass = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; ExitMass &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; (&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass/#ac0e3f20571279f8b3896a687101d7151">BlockMass::getFull</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; TotalBackedgeMass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - scale = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Package up a loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear the subloop exits to prevent quadratic memory usage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/blocknode">BlockNode</a> &amp;M : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Nodes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/#a0270fc5b1a979417e696f5d8b655812d">Working</a>&#91;M.Index&#93;.getPackagedLoop())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>-&gt;Exits.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - node: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bfi-detail/#a01e9ac225b83bb4ded4adbba7d360cbe">getBlockName</a>(M.Index) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482" lineLink="#ac95b88432687074901d5cc201b62be76"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ac95b88432687074901d5cc201b62be76">convertFloatingToInteger</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp;BFI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scaled64 &amp;Min, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scaled64 &amp;Max) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scale the Factor to a size that creates integers.  If possible scale</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// integers so that Max == UINT64&#95;MAX so that they can be best differentiated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is is possible that the range between min and max cannot be accurately</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represented in a 64bit integer without either loosing precision for small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values (so small unequal numbers all map to 1) or saturaturing big numbers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loosing precision for big numbers (so unequal big numbers may map to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UINT64&#95;MAX). We choose to loose precision for small numbers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxBits = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Scaled64::DigitsType) &#42; CHAR&#95;BIT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Users often add up multiple BlockFrequency values or multiply them with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// things like instruction costs. Leave some room to avoid saturating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations reaching UIN64&#95;MAX too early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Slack = 10;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Scaled64 ScalingFactor = Scaled64(1, MaxBits - Slack) / Max;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Translate the floats to integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;float-to-int: min = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Min &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, max = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Max</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, factor = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; ScalingFactor &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  (void)Min;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0; Index &lt; BFI.Freqs.size(); ++Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scaled64 <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> = BFI.Freqs&#91;Index&#93;.Scaled &#42; ScalingFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BFI.Freqs&#91;Index&#93;.Integer = std::max(UINT64&#95;C(1), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a>.toInt&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; - &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; BFI.getBlockName(Index) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: float = &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Unwrap a loop package.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Visits all the members of a loop, adjusting their BlockData according to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the loop&#39;s pseudo-node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515" lineLink="#a4a494d2e2688c4f4ec901183685c215b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4a494d2e2688c4f4ec901183685c215b">unwrapLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase">BlockFrequencyInfoImplBase</a> &amp;BFI, LoopData &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unwrap-loop-package: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; BFI.getLoopName(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;: mass = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Mass &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, scale = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Mass.toScaled();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.IsPackaged = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;  =&gt; combined-scale = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.Scale &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Propagate the head scale through the loop.  Since members are visited in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RPO, the head scale will be updated by the loop scale first, and then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// final head scale will be used for updated the rest of the members.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since the loop has more than one header block, the mass flowing back into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each header will be different. Adjust the mass in each header loop to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To do this, we distribute the initial mass using the backedge masses</span></CodeLine>
